publ: by Everything For Dads Dot Com
name: TheEverythingForDadsNewsBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This fast paced news brief from www.everythingfordads.com is a unique blend of talk, news and views, discussion and commentary about (but not only for) men and dads and parenting from across the globe, covering everything from serious news and issues that impact how we really live in the 21st Century to the funny and entertaining – but always with modern dad-oriented lifestyles and everyday needs in mind. Each show is designed to teach you one core lesson, concept, or idea on which you can take action on easily. Jim Mckenzie is a Dad of 7 amazing children, the Founder of Everything For Dads, a Fatherhood Health and Lifestyle Advocate Coach and the creator of the Dads Stress Buster Program. 
Find out more about Jim's mission to help improve the lives of a million dads and his work here https://www.everythingfordads.com/dads-stress-buster-program. Join the conversation! Tell us about what you would like to hear, share your best stories and advice, or ask Jim a question at feedback@everythingfordads.com

DISCLAIMER: PLEASE READ!
Whilst we strive to ensure that the information that we provide you with is as accurate as possible, the information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment,diagnosis, or for professional financial or legal advice . If you think you may have a medical emergency, please consult your doctor or dial your local emergency response phone number. If you wish to act on any advice given here, please consult an independent financial or legal professional before doing so. 

ABOUT
If there were 5 words to describe how you would LOVE ‘being dad’ to be-- whether you’re a soon-to-be-dad, first time dad, step-dad, an experienced dad, or a divorced dad… would they be…confident, healthy, secure, respected and successful?

Does that resonate with you?

Do you feel you’re missing a piece of the puzzle, or simply feel frustrated with where you’re at beyond your daddy title- even with the direction of your life, money, happiness, fun and fulfillment? If you’re answering ‘Yes’, to any of these you’re in the right place.

I take on everything from creating the relationships of your dreams, think: wife, husband, partner, son, daughter; to supercharged health and living in alignment, to business and brand building.

MAYBE YOU'RE...

Sick and tired of the confusion over what being a man, and a father means, and what’s being asked of you - the contradictions - be macho -be sensitive; be nurturing or be a disciplinarian; be the bread winner or be the man that puts family first. You simply want to feel good about yourself and find some balance in your life -- and feel a little overwhelmed by all the advice on the internet and are looking for fresh strategies to get impactful results.

Doing great right now -- you’re building a successful, pleasurable, balanced and meaningful life and lifestyle, as a man and a dad, but you want to improve and scale on what’s working for you, and reach your highest potential.

Feeling isolated, you like learning new perspectives and habits on being a man and a father, and gaining insights and creating real connections, you want to create a solid foundation that doesn’t necessarily fit into a conventional box for all of your goals and dreams to be built on, and wish more people could relate to what you’re trying to do. (Your family and friends are supportive, but don’t quite “get it”).

You see, I passionately believe that you can achieve a balanced, meaningful and pleasurable life as a man, and as a dad,-- with healthy, loving relationships with your family, your friends, your community, AND be fulfilled pursuing what interests YOU, as well as doing good for the world.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
